Package io.belin.akismet

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
io.belin.akismet.Comment
public class Comment extends Object
Represents a comment submitted by an author.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Author
    author
    The comment's author.
    String
    content
    The comment's content.
    List<String>
    context
    The context in which this comment was posted.
    Instant
    date
    The UTC timestamp of the creation of the comment.
    URI
    permalink
    The permanent location of the entry the comment is submitted to.
    Instant
    postModified
    The UTC timestamp of the publication time for the post, page or thread on which the comment was posted.
    String
    recheckReason
    A string describing why the content is being rechecked.
    URI
    referrer
    The URL of the webpage that linked to the entry being requested.
    String
    type
    The comment's type.

    • Comment

      public Comment(Author author, String content, String type, Instant date, Instant postModified, URI permalink, URI referrer, String recheckReason, List<String> context)
      Creates a new comment.
      Parameters:
      author - The comment's author.
      content - The comment's content.
      type - The comment's type.
      date - The UTC timestamp of the creation of the comment.
      postModified - The UTC timestamp of the publication time for the post, page or thread on which the comment was posted.
      permalink - The permanent location of the entry the comment is submitted to.
      referrer - The URL of the webpage that linked to the entry being requested.
      recheckReason - A string describing why the content is being rechecked.
      context - The context in which this comment was posted.
